items.sentence: You said Mary was beautiful, but I didn\'t think she would be this beautiful.
Before the crash, Tom had been hoping to become a professional tennis player.
The weather is bad and it\'s the day before payday, so I won\'t go out today.
Tom tried everything that was suggested, but still couldn\'t fix the problem.
Tom couldn\'t catch up with the other students after he came out of his coma.
I don\'t know if you remember me, but we met a couple of years ago in Boston.
Sometimes a nod is enough to show someone that you\'re listening attentively.
I saw you out here by yourself and thought you might like someone to talk to.
Why are you dressed like it\'s the middle of the summer when it\'s this cold?
Tom and Mary were sent to the principal\'s office for passing notes in class.
